MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: 27914C0A-2A02-473F-BDD5-C931E3943AA0 title: Create, write, and read a file description: Read and write a file using a StorageFile object.

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic
Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic
Open files and folders with a picker
Open files and folders with a picker

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ' Create sample file; replace if exists. Dim storageFolder As StorageFolder = Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder Dim sampleFile As StorageFile = Await storageFolder.CreateFileAsync("sample.txt", CreationCollisionOption.ReplaceExisting)
Dim storageFolder As StorageFolder = Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder Dim sampleFile As StorageFile = Await storageFolder.GetFileAsync("sample.txt")
await Windows.Storage.FileIO.WriteTextAsync(sampleFile, "Swift as a shadow");
Await Windows.Storage.FileIO.WriteTextAsync(sampleFile, "Swift as a shadow")
var buffer = Windows.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicBuffer.ConvertStringToBinary( "What fools these mortals be", Windows.Security.Cryptography.BinaryStringEncoding.Utf8);
Dim buffer = Windows.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicBuffer.ConvertStringToBinary( "What fools these mortals be", Windows.Security.Cryptography.BinaryStringEncoding.Utf8)
await Windows.Storage.FileIO.WriteBufferAsync(sampleFile, buffer);
Await Windows.Storage.FileIO.WriteBufferAsync(sampleFile, buffer)
var stream = await sampleFile.OpenAsync(Windows.Storage.FileAccessMode.ReadWrite);
Dim stream = Await sampleFile.OpenAsync(Windows.Storage.FileAccessMode.ReadWrite)

Using outputStream = stream.GetOutputStreamAt(0)
' We'll add more code here in the next step.
End Using

Dim dataWriter As New DataWriter(outputStream)
dataWriter.WriteString("DataWriter has methods to write to various types, such as DataTimeOffset.")
await dataWriter.StoreAsync(); await outputStream.FlushAsync();
Await dataWriter.StoreAsync() Await outputStream.FlushAsync()
Dim storageFolder As StorageFolder = Windows.Storage.ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder Dim sampleFile As StorageFile = Await storageFolder.GetFileAsync("sample.txt")
string text = await Windows.Storage.FileIO.ReadTextAsync(sampleFile);
Dim text As String = Await Windows.Storage.FileIO.ReadTextAsync(sampleFile)
var buffer = await Windows.Storage.FileIO.ReadBufferAsync(sampleFile);
Dim buffer = Await Windows.Storage.FileIO.ReadBufferAsync(sampleFile)
Dim dataReader As DataReader = Windows.Storage.Streams.DataReader.FromBuffer(buffer) Dim text As String = dataReader.ReadString(buffer.Length)
var stream = await sampleFile.OpenAsync(Windows.Storage.FileAccessMode.ReadWrite);
Dim stream = Await sampleFile.OpenAsync(Windows.Storage.FileAccessMode.ReadWrite)
ulong size = stream.Size;
Dim size = stream.Size

Using inputStream = stream.GetInputStreamAt(0)
' We'll add more code here in the next step.
End Using
Dim dataReader As New DataReader(inputStream) Dim numBytesLoaded As UInteger = Await dataReader.LoadAsync(CUInt(size)) Dim text As String = dataReader.ReadString(numBytesLoaded)
